scripts.postinstall: cd packages/vtv && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.publish-vtv-pre: cd packages/vtv && yarn version --prerelease --pre-id=canary --no-git-tag-version && yarn build && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version
scripts.packages:link: cd packages/vtv && yarn link && cd ../../packages/console && yarn link vtv && yarn link && cd ../.. && yarn link @resources/console
